org.osdfreactive.policystorage

Class SimplePolicyStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onosproject.store.AbstractStore<PolicyEvent,PolicyStoreDelegate>
      • org.osdfreactive.policystorage.SimplePolicyStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.onosproject.store.Store<PolicyEvent,PolicyStoreDelegate>, PolicyStore

    @Service
public class SimplePolicyStore
extends org.onosproject.store.AbstractStore<PolicyEvent,PolicyStoreDelegate>
implements PolicyStore
    A simple implementation of policy store.
